assignments.name: Set_variable_equal_to_existing_moment
assignments.label: Set variable equal to existing moment

assignments.name: Update_partner_lead_x_0_0_0_0
assignments.label: Add opp and journey to partner lead and moment

choices.name: choice_existing_opp
choices.choiceText: We are already working an active deal with {!recordId.Prospect_Account__r.Account_Name_Compiled__c} (select below)

choices.name: choice_new_opp
choices.choiceText: None of the below opportunities represent the lead submitted by this partner (this will create a new opportunity and <u>approve</u> the Partner Lead submission)

fields.name: screenn_linkedIn
fields.fieldText: LinkedIn: Click here to open

fields.name: screen_no_linkedIn
fields.fieldText: LinkedIn: Not provided. Click to search for {!recordId.Company_Name__c} on LinkedIn.com

value.stringValue: Select the country where this prospect is located....

fields.name: Error_No_MQ
fields.fieldText: Error: No message queue found. Let Jon know if you see this.

fields.name: opps_found_header
fields.fieldText: Open opportunities were found on the account {!recordId.Prospect_Account__r.Account_Name_Compiled__c}:

fields.name: screen_new_or_existing_opp
fields.fieldText: Please review the below open opportunities and select one of the following:

fields.name: opp_selection_note
fields.fieldText: Select a stage 1 deal and to approve this Partner Lead submission. Otherwise, select the opportunity associated with this referral.

fields.name: screen_qual_meeting_date
fields.fieldText: On what date did we book the qualification meeting for this lead?

fields.name: qual_meeting_approval
fields.fieldText: In order to approve a submitted Partner referral we need to book a qualification meeting.

fields.name: screen_Partner_Relationship
fields.fieldText: Select the partner that submitted this referral

value.stringValue: Select the country where this partner is headquartered...

textTemplates.name: slack_open_journey_notify
textTemplates.text:
:handshake: New Approved Referral from {!recordId.Partner_Relationship__r.Partner_DBA_Name__c}


Triaged By: {!$User.Slack_Mention_Handle_Only__c}

Account: {!recordId.Prospect_Account__r.Account_Name_Compiled__c} ({!recordId.Prospect_Account__r.Segment__c})

Account Owner: {!recordId.Contact__r.Account.Owner.Slack_Mention_With_Role_Full_Name__c}

Contact: {!recordId.Contact__r.FirstName} {!recordId.Contact__r.LastName} ({!recordId.Contact__r.Title})

Open Journey: {!recordId.Contact__r.Current_Open_Journey__r.Name} ({!recordId.Contact__r.Current_Open_Journey__r.Stage__c})

Journey Owner: {!recordId.Contact__r.Current_Open_Journey__r.Owner__r.Slack_Mention_With_Role_Full_Name__c}

textTemplates.name: slack_open_opp_notification
textTemplates.text:
:handshake: New Approved Referral from {!recordId.Partner_Relationship__r.Partner_DBA_Name__c}


Triaged By: {!$User.Slack_Mention_With_Role_Full_Name__c}

Account: {!recordId.Prospect_Account__r.Account_Name_Compiled__c} ({!recordId.Prospect_Account__r.Segment__c})

Account Owner: {!recordId.Prospect_Account__r.Owner.Slack_Mention_With_Role_Full_Name__c}

Contact: {!recordId.Contact__r.FirstName} {!recordId.Contact__r.LastName} ({!recordId.Contact__r.Title})

Opportunity: {!recordId.Opportunity__r.Name}

textTemplates.name: slack_reject_lead
textTemplates.text:
:handshake: Referral from {!recordId.Partner_Relationship__r.Partner_DBA_Name__c} rejected


Rejection Reason: {!recordId.Rejection_Reason__c} [{!recordId.Rejection_Reason_Details__c}]

Triaged By: {!$User.Slack_Mention_With_Role_Full_Name__c}

Account: {!recordId.Prospect_Account__r.Account_Name_Compiled__c} ({!recordId.Prospect_Account__r.Segment__c})

Contact: {!recordId.Contact__r.FirstName} {!recordId.Contact__r.LastName} ({!recordId.Contact__r.Title})

Opportunity: {!recordId.Opportunity__r.Name}
